### About 
<p align="left">
I received a BA in Biology, Society and Environment with a minor in Public Health from the University of Minnesota-Twin Cities in 2020. I am currently a Master of Public Health student at the Mailman School of Public Health studying Epidemiology with a certificate in Applied Biostatistics and Public Health Data Science. I am interested in Data Science, statistics and using epidemiological methods/skills and to inform evidence based decision making and research to address real-world public health events.
